events.message: The insured reported a car accident that occurred on the highway, resulting in significant damage to the front bumper and airbags deployed.
The claim has been categorised as an auto accident claim following review of the initial report and the keywords related to vehicle collision.
An experienced claims agent has been assigned to handle this auto accident claim to ensure proper communication and support.
The claim has been acknowledged by the insurance company and a case number has been generated for future reference.
The insured has been requested to provide a police report, photos of the vehicle damage, and medical reports if applicable.
All requested documents including police report and detailed vehicle damage photos have been submitted by the claimant.
The investigation into the circumstances of the accident has commenced, including contacting witnesses and reviewing the police report.
The investigation is complete, confirming the insured's version of events and assessing full extent of vehicle damages.
A settlement offer has been proposed based on the vehicle repair estimates and medical expense evaluations.
The claimant provided feedback on the settlement proposal, requesting clarification on coverage amounts and timelines.
The claim has been approved after adjustments to the settlement offer addressing the customer's concerns.
Payment has been issued to cover the approved vehicle repair costs and any related medical expenses.
The claim has been officially closed as all payments have been made and no outstanding issues remain.
